newsitem.title: USA: INSIGHT - NYMEX natgas idles but risk seen to upside.
newsitem.headline: INSIGHT - NYMEX natgas idles but risk seen to upside.

text.p: NYMEX natural gas futures may have seen the worst of the retreat from the summer's highs near $3.00 per mmbtu, with support seen around $2.00 per mmbtu on the daily charts, and low storage levels going into the winter suggesting the risk is to the upside, traders said.

"While there is little to suggest a big rebound in prices in the short term, there are a number of factors that imply this market should continue to find good support not too far below the psychologically important $2.00 level," Smith Barney's Houston-based analyst, John Saucer, said.
